greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{n = 1 .. infinity } (-1)^(n+1)/ prime(n)^n.
mathematica: digits = 105; NSum[(-1)^(n+1)/Prime[n//Round]^n, {n, 1, Infinity},  Method -> "AlternatingSigns", WorkingPrecision -> digits, NSumTerms -> digits] // RealDigits[#, 10, digits]& // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 24 2014 *)
results.author: _Michel Lagneau_, Dec 03 2011
